channel.title: FLAC
channel.description:
Hey, do any of you know a safe, reliable, good, and free FLAC player? (or any site where i can get the codecs for FLAC?)
Thanks.

item.title: FLAC
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Space is dirt cheap, so it doesn’t matter all that much. Might as well keep the lossless versions, if only as a backup.

Read full topic

item.title: FLAC
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
You can also convert FLAC with foobar.

IMO, just convert it to something smaller and delete the FLAC files, waste of space, and the quality isn’t noticeably different between a V0 VBR MP3 and FLAC.

Unless of course you’re a producer or something with equipment in the range of thousands of dollars, then FLAC might be worth it.

Read full topic

item.title: FLAC
item.dc:creator: DaFox
item.description:
Foobar2000 definitely.

Some alternatives though just to even it out:
AMIP2
Winamp
Songbird

Read full topic

item.title: FLAC
item.dc:creator: hypnotek
item.description:
^ What they said. I’ve spent a long time messing around with the control panel in foobar and made a completely custom experience and layout using very little addons. With a little bit of nosing around, you can get a layout that fits you all your own, complete with keyboard shortcuts for every single feature the program has to offer.

Read full topic

item.title: FLAC
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
^ Foobar2000 ftw, amazingly customisable media player, and it does FLAC out of the box.

Read full topic

item.title: FLAC
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
^I can vouch for this. Though I don’t use the equalizer, even though I use Monkey’s Audio (another lossless codec). Just can’t be bothered.
Also, more components:
https://pelit.koillismaa.fi/plugins/

Read full topic

item.title: FLAC
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
Foobar.

An amazing media player with a comprehensive Equalizer that you should be using if you are bothering to listen to flac.
Download:
https://www.foobar2000.org/download

Additional Features:
https://www.foobar2000.org/components

Audio conversion internal program is very customizable, you just need to download the most recent codecs for any other formats.

Edit: Also note that the interface is VERY customizable.

Read full topic

item.title: FLAC
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
VLC should be able to play flac out of the box, same with winamp.

If you need a codec pack, look no further than CCCP

Read full topic
